mfm.fitting.fit.approx_grad[source]¶

Approximate the derivative of a fit with respect to the parameters xk. The return value of the function is an array.

Parameters:xk – values around which gradient is estimated. These values should be an array of length of the

free fitting parameters :param fit: object of type ‘Fit’ :param epsilon: differential change :param args: additional arguments passed to ‘Fit.get_wres’ :param f0: weighted residuals for the values xk :return:

mfm.fitting.fit.get_errors(fit, parameter_name, scan_range=(None, None), rel_range=0.2, n_steps=30)[source]¶

Performs a chi2-scan for the parameter

Parameters:
  • fit – the fit of type ‘mfm.fitting.Fit’
  • parameter_name – the name of the parameter (in the parameter dictionary)
  • scan_range – the range within the parameter is scanned if not provided ‘rel_range’ is used
  • rel_range – defines +- values for scanning
  • n_steps – number of steps between +-
Returns:
